channel.title: NPC Online Offline help :p

item.title: NPC Online Offline help :p
item.dc:creator: @devildude797 devildude797
item.description:
@devildude797 wrote:

[code]}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 535) { // fairy - white armour shop keper
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “White Armour Shop here!”;
}
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“Admin Mich”) && npcID == 241)
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = "Yewww!!! Admin Mitch is online!!! ";
}
else
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = "Admin Mitch is Offline, Aww we miss him ";
}

}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 209) { // nulodian - black armour shopkeeper
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Black Armour Shop here!”;
}
}[/code]

I put in a code on top of the message and below, if you could show me how its ment to look. Please do :0[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2007, 12:06:29 AM[/size][hr]i read runeguy’s thread, but i dont know where to put the “}” in :S
this is what happens when i compile:

[code]NPCHandler.java:462: cannot find symbol
symbol : variablenpc ID
location: class NPCHandler
if <PlayerHandler.isPlayeron<“admin mitch”> && npcID == 3303>

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details
1 error
File compiled successfully![/code]

what do i do ?
